title: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a town on the southeast coast of Bangladesh. It's known for its very long, sandy beachfront, stretching from Sea Beach in the north to Kolatoli Beach in the south.

title: Srimangal
description: Srimangal is a city in the northeastern part of Bangladesh. It's known for its tea gardens, forests, and wildlife.

title: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is a mangrove forest in the delta of the Ganges, Brahmaputra, and Meghna rivers on the Bay of Bengal. It is home to the Bengal tiger, saltwater crocodile, and other wildlife.
